me abhiyogaya jaya ganimata nam ada kala yuththe meyata erehiwa pulul jathika sanwidhanayak lesa ekamuthu wimaya.parlimenthuwa thulin arambaiya haki mema ekamuthuwa eyin nonawathi jathika sanwidhanawala samaja balayenda sannaddha kala yuthuya.parlimenthuwa thuladi eyata jathika hela urumaya,jathika nidahas peramuna,mahajana eksath peramuna pramukha jathika balawega walada shri lanka nidahas pakshaya thula sitina ratata hithathi balawegayeda sahaya laba gatha yuthuya.mema abhiyogaya kalinma awabodha kara gath jathika hela urumaya eyata erehiwa prabalawa wirodhaya dakwima pasasumata lak wiya yuththaki.eyata anuwama yamin jathika nidahas peramunada rajayata pera anathura angawa thibe.namuth sathi antha samahara puwathpath anuwa rajaya ema anathuru angawimen asathutata pathwa thibena hadak pennmu kara thibe.eyata erehiwa shri lan ni pa ye yayi kiyamin niwata amathiwarun niwedana pawa nikuth kirimata pawa perata with thibe.
